Sheet¶

Connect with Google Sheets and use it as a central database for getting and updating paramater sets.

class dapt.sheet.Sheet(spreedsheetID, creds_path='credentials.json')¶

Setup the Google Sheet and authentication data.

Parameters:
  • spreadsheetID (string) – The spreadsheet id
  • creds_path (string) – The file with your oauth.2 credentials json file
getKeyIndex(key)¶

Get the index of a column name (key) in the Google Sheet

Parameters:key (string) – the column name with witch to get the index
Returns:The column number of the key (index 1)
getRecords(sheet_id=0)¶

Gets the data in the desired sheet

Parameters:sheet_id (int) – The index of which sheet (tab) to use. When looking at the Google Sheet online each sheet (tab) is indexed, starting with 0, from left to right
Returns:A list of dictionaries with paramaters.
sheet(sheet_id=0)¶

Use the credentials to create a client to interact with the Google Drive API

Parameters:sheet_id (int) – The index of which sheet (tab) to use. When looking at the Google Sheet online each sheet (tab) is indexed, starting with 0, from left to right
update_cell(i, j, text)¶

Update the text of a cell in the Google Sheet

Parameters:
  • i (int) – The row of the cell (index 0)
  • j (int) – The column of the cell (index 0)
  • text (string) – The text to update the cell with
